2068470.name: Idol Hell Demo
2068470.description:
Idol Hell is a 2D, Touhou-like, Shoot 'em up, bullet hell game taking inspiration from Japanese school idols and anime tropes. The game features 4 modes of difficulty and 6 chapters where you combat a variety of different bosses in over-the-top battles!

In Idol Hell, you play as Medli, a robot schoolgirl idol set on a warpath to free her closest friend. Fight through hordes of enemies and other cutesy robot idols in this vibrant, precision-based game.
2068470.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
